item.name: Obtain information about all Nobel Prizes or search for a specific set of Nobel Prizes. Note that not all information about the Laureates are provided in the output, as a request of making this endpoints response lighter. Call the laureates endpoint for full information.

request.name: Obtain information about all Nobel Prizes or search for a specific set of Nobel Prizes. Note that not all information about the Laureates are provided in the output, as a request of making this endpoints response lighter. Call the laureates endpoint for full information.

description.content: Obtain information about all Nobel Prizes or search for a specific set of Nobel Prizes. Note that not all information about the Laureates are provided in the output, as a request of making this endpoints response lighter. Call the laureates endpoint for full information.

query.description: The number of items to skip before starting to collect the result set
The numbers of items to return
The sort order (result is sorted by year)
Year the Nobel Prize was awarded, in the form of YYYY
Used in combination with nobelPrizeYear to specify a range of years to return results from. NobelPrizeYear is required
Nobel Prize category
Format of output (Default = json)
Language of output if format is csv (Default = en)

response.name: Successful call of Nobel Prize(s) according to the filled fields
Bad request.The request could not be understood by the server due to malformed syntax, modifications needed.
Not Found. The requested resource could not be found but may be available again in the future.
Unprocessable Entity. The request was well-formed but was unable to be followed due to semantic errors.

item.name: Obtain information about one specific Nobel Prize. Used as unique identifier for links.

request.name: Obtain information about one specific Nobel Prize. Used as unique identifier for links.

description.content: Obtain information about one specific Nobel Prize. Used as unique identifier for links.

variable.description: (Required) Year of the awarded Nobel Prize, in the form of YYYY

item.name: Obtain information about Nobel Prize Laureates (persons and organizations) and their Nobel Prize(s), or search for a set of Laureates. Returns full information about the Laureates and Prizes.

request.name: Obtain information about Nobel Prize Laureates (persons and organizations) and their Nobel Prize(s), or search for a set of Laureates. Returns full information about the Laureates and Prizes.

description.content: Obtain information about Nobel Prize Laureates (persons and organizations) and their Nobel Prize(s), or search for a set of Laureates. Returns full information about the Laureates and Prizes.

query.description: The number of items to skip before starting to collect the result set
The numbers of items to return
Sort order, result is sorted alphabetically by known name
Numeric ID of the Laureate (unique key for each Nobel Laureate)
Laureate's name (person or organization)
Laureate's gender if person
Text in Laureate's motivation
Affiliation(s) for the Laureate at the time of the award
Laureate's place of residence at the time is awarded
Birth date of Laureate if Person. Search by year in the form of YYYY, by month -MM-, by day -DD or YYYY-MM-DD
Return Laureates born within a range of years between birthDate and birthDateTo. BirthDate field is required
Death date of Laureate if Person. Search by year in the form of YYYY, by month -MM-, by day -DD or YYYY-MM-DD
Return Laureates deceased within a range of years between deathDate and deathhDateTo. DeathDate field is required
Founding date of Laureate if Organization. Search by year in the form of YYYY, by month -MM-, by day -DD or YYYY-MM-DD
Laureate's city of birth if person
Laureate's country of birth if person
Laureate's continent of birth if person. Continent as in geonames.org standard
Laureate's city of death if person
Laureate's country of death if person
Laureate's continent of death if person. Continent as in geonames.org standard
City where organization was founded
Country where organization was founded
Continent where organization was founded. Continent as in geonames.org standard
City where organization's hearquarters are
Country where organization's hearquarters are
Continent where organization's hearquarters are. Continent as in geonames.org standard
The year the Nobel Prize was awarded, in the form of YYYY
Used in combination with nobelPrizeYear to specify a range of years between nobelPrizeYear and YearTo. nobelPrizeYear is required
Nobel Prize category.
Output format (Default = json).
Language if output format is csv (default = en).

response.name: Successful call of Laureate(s).
Bad request.The request could not be understood by the server due to malformed syntax, modifications needed.
Not Found. The requested resource could not be found but may be available again in the future.
Unprocessable Entity. The request was well-formed but was unable to be followed due to semantic errors.
